about_the_game:
Start your story about writing a real bestseller and meet four new friends, who may become your muses for it!

Demo version contains:
- Start of the general route
- All 4 main characters (casual skins)
- 5 Illustrations


Emy… Is she rich and mysterious because she is a vampire – or is she a vampire because she is rich and mysterious? And most importantly, what is behind the image of a spoiled and demanding girl?


Nia is an aspiring streamer and a wild lover of extreme sports. She seems normal compared to her friends, but will you be able to keep up with her pace and overcome her tough personality?


Uma is a cute owner of a magical trinket shop. Her enthusiasm is contagious and her magic really seems to work. It's time to explore an unknown world!


Six is like she came from another planet. Maybe you can really learn about the secrets of distant space from her? Why does she like Earth out of all the other planets?

Nia is an aspiring streamer and a wild lover of extreme sports. She seems normal compared to her friends, but will you be able to keep up with her pace and overcome her tough personality?


Uma is a cute owner of a magical trinket shop. Her enthusiasm is contagious and her magic really seems to work. It's time to explore an unknown world!

fullgame.name: EmyLiveShow: How To Write A Bestseller

name: EmyLiveShow: How To Write A Bestseller Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Win 7 or higher 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3 Gen or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7400M, NVIDIA GeForce GT620M (min 2 Gb)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4 Gen or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce gtx 550 (min 2 Gb)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated

short_description: Become the co-author of an amazing book! All you have to do is choose which of the four lovely heroines will inspire you!
